text: sense of humor and his creativity even under duress to me is inspiring. And I don't know other resistance leaders of my generation of my time that bring that to it in a way that really made me think in a completely different way about what it means to stand up for freedom, stand up for for freedom of choice. Yulean the Vanya, it is a real honor to have you here and I wish all the best for you. I just hope doors open for you everywhere and I wish all the best for you. Thank you.
